Ecstatic fast feedback

Ecstatic proposes a dynamic workflow to write static websites: during development ecstatic can serve and regenerate your website automatically using the serve command:

Ecstatic will serve by default our website in http://localhost:8080. Every change we make and every new pillar file we create will be automatically translated. You need only to refresh your website. You can even change your theme dinamically :)

This website is developed using Pillar and Ecstatic
Candy theme by Guillermo Polito.
